Tenten summons a [[Wikipedia:Manriki-gusari|manriki-gusari]] from one of her [[scroll]]s and uses it to restrain her opponent. When her opponent is restrained, she uses the scroll to launch a barrage of weapons at them and then finally slams them into the ground with the manriki-gusari.

== Trivia ==
* This technique was named in ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Heroes]]'' and ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Heroes 2: The Phantom Fortress]]'' as it was unnamed in the anime.
